title: In cases where layout has already been sanctioned and layout roads are incorporated as Development Plan roads prior to these regulations
clause_text: In cases where layout has already been sanctioned and layout roads are incorporated as Development Plan roads prior to these regulations. If the compensation in the form of FSI / or by any means has already been granted to the owner.
section: Cases not eligible for Transferable Development Rights (TDR)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: In cases where layout has already been sanctioned and layout roads are incorporated as Development Plan roads prior to these regulations.
